name: Securibox
tag_list: file-manager, e-document, cloud, storage, invoice, bill, pay-slip
overview:
Securibox is a Saas software editor, and operates a secured file manager that automatically collect and centralize all the official documents that individuals have to keep. It provides to its BtoB customers a range of white-label solutions to collect documents from various user-interfaces on the web and allow them to be stored in their online vault, providing an extra layer of value and datas. Major french banking institutions already use Securibox’ technology to allow their customers to establish a link between an invoice, and the payment reflected on their banking account.

People receive more and more electronic documents that they have to keep on a mid/long term basis : invoices, pay slips, statement of accounts, … All these documents are spread on various user interfaces, and users have to remember dozen of different IDs and passwords.

With Securibox, just enter your ID and password into the corresponding “Agent Web”, and Securibox will connect to your account every day to check if a new document is available for you. If this is the case, Securibox will collect it, and secure it in your account.

People can then archive, organize and manage all their official documents. They can also follow and optimize their consumption for each service with personal dashboards. Day after day, we build for you an electronic cabinet where all your official documents and data are stored.

Your banker ask for a proof of residency? Easy : just send him your last electricity invoice through your Securibox’s account. Your insurer wants an invoice to refund you? Easy: it’s securely stored in your Securibox’s account!

video_embeds.description: Nicolas Herz’s interview (co-founder and CEO - in French)
